basics.name: Dagim Tadele
basics.label: Researcher
basics.summary: Molecular Biologist/Geneticist by training and self-trained Data Analyst dedicated to provide groundbreaking insights into the mechanisms that drive cancer evolution and drug resistance utilizing game theory formalisim, ultimately paving the way for more effective treatments.

work.name:
Cleveland Clinic, Theory Division, Ohio, USA
              Oslo University Hospital, Molecular Genetics, Oslo, Norway
work.summary: Teaching at Palmer Physical Laboratory (now 302 Frist Campus Center). While not a professor at Princeton, I associated with the physics professors and continued to give lectures on campus.
highlights: Cancer evolution, Game theory, Drug resistance

awards.title: Nobel Prize in Physics
awards.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'
